did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Records of the Comisionado de Mineria 1825-1826
did.abstract: Handwritten documents pertaining to the titles of five mining claims for the Santa Ana Mine, San Pedro Vigilia Mine, La Frontaina Mine, Foubacachi Mine, and Bronzisa Mine.

repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Records of the Comisionado de Mineria (MS 026). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into 3 books.

list.item: Book I: Instrucciones Formadas Sobre La Mina De Santa Ana En El Mineral De San Juan Bautista De Sonora 1825-1826
Book II: Instrucciones Formadas Sobre Las Minas De San Pedro Vigilia La Frontaina Y Foubacachi En Sonora 1825-1826
Book III: Mina De La Bronzisa En Sonora 1825-1826

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Handwritten documents pertaining to the titles of five mining claims for the Santa Ana Mine, San Pedro Vigilia Mine, La Frontaina Mine, Foubacachi Mine, and Bronzisa Mine. The mining claims are located in the judicial district of Moctezuma, Sonora, near the towns of Cumpas and Oposura.

relatedmaterial.p: Digitized files from the collection can be found as part of Arizona-Sonora Documents OnlineunderRecords of the Comisionado de Mineria
